'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The longhouse was elected by Rauataians as a form of disaster relief for the Huana living on the island, after a series of storms destroyed their village. Though housing the castes packed together the Rauatai way has stressed a number of Huana, it has also steadily eroded caste divisions leading to new friendships and transfer of skills - though the Mataru once heading the village cannot conceal his disdain for ''equality''. 

==Points of interest==
* This is a single, long building with characters spread out across. The elitist Mataru occupies the fanciest single quarters at the head of the building.

==Characters==
* [[Watūri]], [[Osauro]], and [[Nedunga]]

==Loot==
* [[Superb War Hammer (Deadfire)|Superb War Hammer]]: In a locked chest in [[Watūri]]'s room - requires [[Mechanics]] 13. You can easily grab it while he's out of the room, inspecting the armoire in the hall.
